name: Granny Poltergeist Ghost
description:
Angry Ghost Escape from Haunted Granny game - is simple but hard to master ghost hell neighbor house escape game - jump & run to collect all pieces of mystery book adventure about haunted gran evil neighborhood.

Angry Hell neighbor grandma asked you to meet in her hellish home. Maybe ghost gran can give you a pie or Xmas sweets? No ! It is your luck you can run & jump to collect all pieces of mystery book before saying "Hello, grandma!", because angry gran is really evil & angry gran from Hell !!! Try to escape neighbor granny house as far as possible & return to your parents! Every step is dangerous, fear is really strong - granny is master of trapping for mystery book pages! 
Move carefully not be captured by moving poltergeist or escape fall into the hands of mystery poltergeist death! What you only can do in this ghost place is Run & Run faster!
★ Blox series first game
★ New hell neighbor escape
★ Easy controls 
★ Dangerous neighbor traps - lots of traps in Granny ghost haunted mystery place
★ Blox graphics just to have fun with traps
★ Small game size
★ Featured cool arcade sounds & music loops!

Explore all haunted hellish house rooms & cellar!

Crazy granny home full of traps, saw & acid around for all fans of such hardcore run & jump game!

★ Enjoy Escape House - Fear is near ★
